thread.title: Albert Einstein look-alike arrested for groping woman
thread.title_full: Albert Einstein look-alike arrested for groping woman - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Albert Einstein look-alike arrested for groping woman
text:
63-year-old homeless man Jerry Salerno allegedly groped a 30-year-old woman outside the Port Authority Bus Terminal in Midtown Wednesday. What a dirty bum!
Cops cuffed a 63-year-old homeless man outside Midtown’s Port Authority Bus Terminal after he groped a 30-year-old woman walking past him, officials said Thursday.
Jerry Salerno is facing charges of sexual abuse, resisting arrest and forcible touching in connection with Wednesday’s noontime attack on Eighth Ave. near 40th St., officials said.
A Port Authority police officer was patrolling outside the terminal when she heard a woman screaming at Salerno.
When he approached, the woman told the officer that Salerno had grabbed her inappropriately, according to Port Authority spokesman Joe Pentangelo.
Salerno, who bears an uncanny resemblance to Albert Einstein, fought off police who tried to question him and was taken into custody after a brief struggle, Pentangelo said.
His victim was not injured.
Salerno’s arraignment was pending Thursday morning.
Shannon Stapleton/Reuters/REUTERS Salerno was arrested outside of the bus terminal Wednesday and is facing charges of sexual abuse, resisting arrest and forcible touching. ttracy@nydailynews.com
